history.proof: intros. intros x y H'. qsimpl.

exceptions.tactic: intros X Y R R' incl_trans.
intros X' Y R R' incl_trans.
intros X' Y' R R' incl_trans.
intros X' Y' R'' R' incl_trans.
intros X' Y' R'' R''' incl_trans.

exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variables x, y.

original: intros X Y R R' incl_trans. intros x y H. induction H. - apply S_star with (y:=y). + apply incl_trans. apply H. + apply star_refl. - apply S_star with (y:=y). + apply incl_trans. apply H. + apply IHstar.
